long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OnePgr Chrome Plugin is the next generation communication application that allows you to create and host video meetings AND record video messages from your Chrome browser with a few clicks. Additional functionality to send email, make phone calls, share documents, view meeting recordings and analytics is available at onepgr.com.
